2. For each question user will get 10 seconds to answer. \n3. The faster the user the more point he gets. \n4. For every second saved user gets 1 point if the user has given the right answer.
Quizo provide 1V1 Battle and Daily contests to play with different opponents. You can easily win cash & prizes on the daily basis.
